sql.name: hbeoms.allformspecialityrolename_cl
sql.item: select log.c700020403 as 处理人, item.c802800001 as 专业, count(distinct(t.C1)) as 工单数 from {1000} t,(select * from {100} union all select * from {200}) log,{400} item where log.C700020402='完成' and t.C1=log.c700020407 and item.c802800001=t.c700000014 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 {1} {3} group by log.c700020403,item.c802800001

sql.name: hbeoms.allformspecialitysendscopename_cl
sql.item: select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, item.c802800001 as 专业, count(distinct(t.C1)) as 工单数 from {1000} t,(select * from {100} union all select * from {200}) log,{600} item,{300} u,{400} g,{500} gu where log.C700020402='完成' and t.C1=log.c700020407 and item.c802800001=t.c700000014 and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and u.C1=gu.c620000028 and gu.c620000027=g.C1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 {1} {2} {3} group by g.c630000018,item.c802800001

sql.name: hbeoms.allformspecialitysendpfrolename_cl
sql.item: select distinct(t.c700000004) as 派单人, item.c802800001 as 专业, count(distinct(t.C1)) as 工单数 from {1000} t,{600} item where item.c802800001=t.c700000014 {1} {3} group by t.c700000004,item.c802800001

sql.name: hbeoms.allformspecialitysendspfcopename_cl
sql.item: select distinct(g.c630000018) as 部门, item.c802800001 as 专业, count(distinct(t.C1)) as 工单数 from {1000} t,{600} item,{300} u,{400} g,{500} gu where item.c802800001=t.c700000014 and t.c700000005=u.c630000001 and u.C1=gu.c620000028 and gu.c620000027=g.C1 {1} {3} group by g.c630000018,item.c802800001

sql.name: hbeoms.titlename_cl
sql.item: select 't'||t.schemaid,BaseCategory.C650000001 as basechname, BaseCategory.C650000002 as basename from {500} BaseCategory,arschema t where t.name=BaseCategory.C650000002 and t.schemaid={5}

sql.name: hbeoms.allformpeoplepfsql_cl
sql.item: select u.C630000003 as 处理人 from {200} u where 1=1 {2}

sql.name: hbeoms.allformpeoplesql_cl
sql.item: select u.C630000003 as 派单人 from {200} u where 1=1 {2}

sql.name: hbeoms.allformspecialitysql_cl
sql.item: select u.c802800001 as 专业 from {400} u

sql.name: hbeoms.allformgroupsql_cl
sql.item: select g.C630000018 as 部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {2}
